name: sbtALT
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wsb(s0, s1, w0)
-| wi(wal(s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w0))
-| w0

cumulated.origin:
|- wsb(s0, s1, w0)
-| wi(wal(s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w0))
-| w0

comment: Alternate proof of ~ sbt , shorter but using ~ ax-4 and ~ ax-5 . (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-2004.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
